lines.text: [the vending machine finally dispenses coffee when Ray gives it a hard kick]
Hey, we don't take no shit from a machine!
[Jason smashes the android menacing Mera into scrap metal]
We don't take no shit from machines!
A base! It is a god-damned base and we're being invited in.
Yeah, but who's throwin' the party?
Oh, Christ. That's what we are - spare parts.
Boys, we're gonna be doing a little search and destroy on the goddamn moon! Yeeeeeehaaa!
